RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the agent: United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency involved in the arrest and investigation of human smuggling cases, with agents conducting patrols and stops on highways
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Officer Reymundo Reyes: conducted a traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., noticed he was nervous and shaking during the interaction; issued a citation and impounded the black Dodge pickup truck due to unclear ownership and lack of insurance information. Also, informed IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. that he needed to wait for United States Border Patrol agents to arrive.
defendant associated with the black Dodge pickup truck, arrested for suspected involvement in human smuggling; felt not free to leave after being handed his citation and was waiting for the United States Border Patrol agents to arrive
